elements.Text: Will it be easier to remember things when you have less to worry about?

elements.name: Lost Things_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.

elements.text: Remember to answer this question based on the ending of the story you just read, not how you think it would end. This will help reinforce more flexible thinking!
